channel.title: Rules of this Board
channel.description:
This board is more lenient on rules, so make sure you take full advantage of it. Some things you might want to remember:
[ul][li][url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]Global forum rules[/url] apply[/li] [li]Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other[/li] [li]This board is not meant for questions, please post those [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,145.0.html]here[/url][/li] [li]No pornography, please[/li] [li]No warez[/li] [li]No extremely grotesque images[/li] [li]No requesting 'coders', hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.[/li] [li]No more "leaving", "sympathy", or "coming back" topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/li][/ul]

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

KroniKz_:

Is there a way we can get a board were we can play games and talk about anything that doesnt add on to our post count so we dont always to stay on topic anything. Its just an idea, :P.

If you’re talking about a ‘spam board’, moparisthebest is against the idea of it, so that probably won’t happen.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Is there a way we can get a board were we can play games and talk about anything that doesnt add on to our post count so we dont always to stay on topic anything. Its just an idea, :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

The caches just contain intellectual property, as does the client. You could somewhat argue that even the protocol is Jagex’s IP. Either way, we don’t allow people to upload the caches to this site either.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:108, topic:277227”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=365887.msg4005146#msg4005146 date=1338535520]

Warez as in illegally distributed software ? ? ? ? ?

Yes. The forum doesn’t condone the distributing of illegal software.

RSPS is illegal

Only the client.
[/quote]
I thought the caches above 474 were also illegal[/quote]
By client I meant primarily the cache yes as opposed to servers… And I’m fairly sure it’s all of the caches? Unless they released it at one point.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:277227”]This board is more lenient on rules, so make sure you take full advantage of it. Some things you might want to remember:

[ul][li]Global forum rules apply[/li]
[li]Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other[/li]
[li]This board is not meant for questions, please post those here[/li]
[li]No pornography, please[/li]
[li]No warez[/li]
[li]No extremely grotesque images[/li]
[li]No requesting ‘coders’, hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.[/li]
[li]No more “leaving”, “sympathy”, or “coming back” topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/li][/ul][/quote]

No warez
Assuming this is the place to ask. What is "warez" Do you mean ... Items/ products?

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The selling in signatures notification has been there for many months now, and I’ve even added some bold print to the official forum rules so people stop doing it. Because of these extra measures it’s straight to an infraction now, no private message first.

[size=32pt]NO SELLING ON MOPAR[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Davidi2:

I agree. I think I mentioned to you earlier that rule was confusing anyways It’s much easier to handle on a case-by-case basis.

It was originally there to stop the encouragement of spamming. It’s a different general discussion board these days.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I agree. I think I mentioned to you earlier that rule was confusing anyways It’s much easier to handle on a case-by-case basis.

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Done. I’m fine with that rule being gone, though it does not give anyone license to start spamming all over the place.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:97, topic:277227”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=365887.msg2775161#msg2775161 date=1241479142]
This board is more lenient on rules, so make sure you take full advantage of it. Some things you might want to remember:

[ul][li]Global forum rules apply[/li]
[li]Try to treat everyone the same, this board is not meant for flaming each other[/li]
[li]This board is not meant for questions, please post those here[/li]
[li]No pornography please[/li]
[li]No warez[/li]
[li]No extremely grotesque images[/li]
[li]No forum games[/li]
[li]No requesting ‘coders’, hosters, or development teams in this section/General Questions.[/li]
[li]No more “leaving”, “sympathy”, or “coming back” topics (but introduction topics are still allowed and encouraged :))[/li][/ul]

[/quote]

Remove No Forum Games.[/quote]

People do forum games anyway and no one does anything about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:95, topic:277227”]I’d just like to point out that NOWHERE in the rules does it say that selling services in your signature is allowed. If a staff member can point out where it says otherwise I will retract this statement.

Starting now I will officially start private messaging anyone I see selling or buying anything in their signature giving them 24-72 hours (based on their activity) to change it, and if they do not comply they will get the normal infraction setting for breaking that rule. If you know anyone selling anything in their signature I suggest you warn them now.

Advertising has been allowed in your signature, not selling. People just took ‘advertising’ to mean selling as well.[/quote]

I concur.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’d just like to point out that NOWHERE in the rules does it say that selling services in your signature is allowed. If a staff member can point out where it says otherwise I will retract this statement.

Starting now I will officially start private messaging anyone I see selling or buying anything in their signature giving them 24-72 hours (based on their activity) to change it, and if they do not comply they will get the normal infraction setting for breaking that rule. If you know anyone selling anything in their signature I suggest you warn them now.

Advertising has been allowed in your signature, not selling. People just took ‘advertising’ to mean selling as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Rules of this Board
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

If it’s a long topic (post your character) it’s just easier to quote the image. I hate people who quote the OP though.
